  • Type Parameters:
    TDomainClass - The type of datum for which a DatumProducer is to be built.

    public class DatumProducerBuilder<TDomainClass>
extends AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,DatumProducerBuilder<TDomainClass>>
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumProducer.
